title: When taking a survey on mobile...
body: When taking a survey on mobile (Samsung galaxy note 3), clicking into the box to edit your response causes the form to submit. Happened twice.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! We'll look into it! ^-^

Would you be able to provide how you received the survey/what the survey was asking/your email address? (You can poke me in the client for your email address, if you'd prefer.)
